content.raw: Note about RGBD camera sensor, from pull request #540. It would be nice to create a new sdf element for `<rgbd_camera>` so that we can specify different clip distances for the RGB image and the depth image. Also, the camera probably could use different noise parameters for the RGB and depth images.
content.html: Note about RGBD camera sensor, from pull request #540. It would be nice to create a new sdf element for <rgbd_camera> so that we can specify different clip distances for the RGB image and the depth image. Also, the camera probably could use different noise parameters for the RGB and depth images.
